title: Magus of the Struggle

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - There's two Town Power roles and they can't win with each other. All players are informed of this and the rolelist is updated accordingly.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Learn someone's role each night. If you have the Necronomicon, you may attack them instead.

desc:
Post 1992
*Fight amongst yourselves. I'll come out on top.*
